312460543.Title: Whirlpool 7.4 cu. ft. 240-Volt Chrome Shadow Smart Electric Vented Dryer with AccuDry System

301231463.Title: Samsung 7.5 Total cu. ft. Electric FlexDry Dryer with Steam in Black Stainless, Fingerprint Resistant Black Stainless Steel
301231463.Description: Samsung's FlexDry Dryer provides the ultimate drying flexibility, by combining a conventional large capacity dryer with a delicate dryer, so you dry delicate and everyday garments at the same time. The standstill delicate dryer lets you lay flat undergarments, sweaters, and accessories to dry; to prevent items from shrinking and fabric damage. Combined with the Samsung FlexWash Washer, the Samsung FlexWash + FlexDry laundry pair provides a complete laundry solution to provide the optimal care for your clothes. Advanced features like Multi-Steam technology gives you the ability to steam away wrinkles. Color: Fingerprint Resistant Black Stainless Steel.

301846897.Title: Whirlpool 7.4 cu. ft. 240-Volt White Commercial Electric Vented Dryer Coin Operated

301201776.Title: Samsung 7.4 cu. ft. Electric Dryer with Steam in White
301201776.Description: Samsung 7.4 cu. ft. capacity Dryer features Multi-Steam technology to give you the ability to steam away wrinkles. Eco Dry uses up to 25% less energy for every load. 308716328.Title: LG Electronics 7.3 cu. ft. Ultra Large White Smart Electric Vented Dryer with EasyLoad Door & Sensor Dry, ENERGY STAR

LG Sensor Dry system measures the amount of moisture levels throughout the cycle and automatically adjusts the drying time. And, stay ahead of the cycle and access key LG dryer features remotely with SmartThinQ technology. One touch says it all: perfectly dry clothes. All the more reason to take advantage of the 7.3 cu. ft. extra large capacity that handles really large loads. You will save time and energy. Color: White.

313784115.Title: BLACK+DECKER 3.5 cu. ft. Capacity White Electric Dryer
313784115.Description: Apartment life has its fair share of challenges and one of the biggest is dealing with laundry. There's so little room that most appliances don't fit and the ones that do can't get the job done. Or at least, that's how it was in the past. Here's one superb example from a brand with over a century's worth of experience in creating efficient home appliances and tools. Enjoy maximum efficiency and convenience with this Portable Dryer by black plus decker. Impressive power for a machine its size, our compact laundry dryer is the perfect choice for space-conscious homeowners. Several convenient features like automatic overheat protection, sensors that adjust heat settings based on the dryness of your clothes and a double layer lint filter to trap all those annoying loose fibers. The machine starts the dry cycle with cool air and only switches to hot air later, giving you great results while saving money on electricity bills. Our 1400-Watts dryer uses a 120-Volt outlet, which means there's no need to install a 220-Volt. The stainless steel drum is built to withstand damage like scratches and marks from zippers or the like. Color: White.

314191827.Title: Magic Chef 3.5 cu. ft. White Compact Electric Dryer
314191827.Description: Perfect for smaller laundry loads, the Magic Chef Compact 3.5 cu. ft. Electric Dryer is ideal for limited spaces. It uses a standard 110-Volt (120 VAC, 15 Amp) outlet, eliminating the need for special wiring that is required with many other dryers. Its three temperature settings provide custom options for proper fabric care. Color: White.

311036761.Title: Samsung 7.4 cu. ft. 240-Volt Black Stainless Steel Electric Dryer with Steam Sanitize ENERGY STAR, Fingerprint Resistant Black Stainless Steel

314455477.Description: Evenly dry large loads with this 7.0 cu. ft. capacity dryer. Maximum Drying Time: 180 Minutes 1 year manufacture Package Content: Folding Clothes Rack X1 Upper Support Pole X1 Support Pole Connector X1 Lower Support Pole X1 Waterproof Protection Plate X1 Heater X1 Heat Insulated Tube Cover X1 Dryer Legs X3 The clips on the main picture are not included in the package Please acknowledge before purchasing: This is the portable folding dryer, which works with air flow. This product is 110-Volt with 900-Watt power consumption; it takes a longer time to dry the clothes when compared with the regular dryer. Color: Blue.

205541551.Title: Whirlpool 7.0 cu. ft. 240-Volt White Electric Vented Dryer with Wrinkle Shield Plus
205541551.Description: Help prevent damage caused by overdrying and spend less time in the laundry room with the Whirlpool 7.0 cu. ft. high-efficiency electric dryer. This large capacity dryer evenly dries loads the first time with the AccuDry sensor drying system by measuring moisture and temperature levels. Two built-in sensors help the dryer automatically stop the cycle when the load is dry, so this Whirlpool top load dryer uses less energy than those equipped with the AutoDry system. This high-efficiency electric dryer is also built with American Pride and designed, engineered and assembled in the U.S.A. Color: White.

207024866.Title: LG SIGNATURE 9.0 cu. ft. Mega Capacity Black Stainless Steel Smart Electric Vented Dryer with TurboSteam & Pedestal Compatible
207024866.Description: When you picture your dream laundry room, this is the dryer that you'll want to be in it. Every contour, every elegant line creates a look like no other, with unexpected touches like an integrated control panel right on the door. The 9.0 cu. ft. Mega Capacity keeps up with even LG's biggest washers, load for load. But no dream is complete without the power of LG TurboSteam technology that lets you reduce wrinkles and odors and give favorite clothes new life in only 10 minutes. Color: Black Stainless Steel.

304171304.Title: LG Electronics 7.3 cu. ft. Ultra Large High-Efficiency White Electric Vented Dryer with Sensor Dry & Reversible Door, ENERGY STAR
304171304.Description: LG Sensor Dry system measures the amount of moisture levels throughout the cycle and automatically adjusts the drying time. All the more reason to take advantage of the 7.3 cu. ft. extra large capacity that handles really large loads. Youll save time and energy!. Color: White.

207188948.Title: Hotpoint 6.2 cu. ft. 240-Volt White Electric Vented Dryer
207188948.Description: Your GE dryer has 3 heat selections that offer a choice of drying temperatures for personalized fabric care. Auto Dry for clothes that come out feeling and looking great, this setting monitors air temperature to set the optimal drying time. Aluminized alloy drum improves energy efficiency and resists corrosion. Color: White.

205932089.Title: Samsung 7.2 cu. ft. Electric Dryer in White
205932089.Description: The Samsung 7.2 cu. ft. electric dryer has 8 preset cycles to accommodate all your dying needs. Moisture sensors help protect your laundry by detecting when its reached optimal level of dryness and automatically shutting off. And for added convenience, the Lint Filter Indicator light on the control panel is illuminated when the filter is in need of cleaning. Color: White.

309171671.Title: Samsung 7.4 cu. ft. Fingerprint Resistant Black Stainless Electric Dryer with Steam Sanitize+, Fingerprint Resistant Black Stainless Steel
309171671.Description: Advanced features like Steam Sanitize+ eliminate 99.9% of germs and bacteria1, while Multi-Steam technology relaxes and smooths away wrinkles from everyday wear. Sensor Dry optimizes cycle time and temperature to thoroughly dry without damaging your clothes. With 12 preset drying cycles, you can cover almost every drying need for your active family. Color: Fingerprint Resistant Black Stainless Steel.

313600788.Title: Panda 0.6 cu. ft. 120-Volt Gray Electric Stainless Steel Portable Spin Dryer, 3200 RPM
313600788.Description: With a spin speed of 3200 RPM this gravity drain spin dryer from Panda is designed to remove as much excess moisture as possible from your laundry, thereby reducing drying times and costs and helping to prolong the life of your laundered items by removing more harmful mineral deposits and detergents than your washing machine can alone. They are easy to move and small enough to operate in a restricted space. Our spin dryers remove excess moisture from your washing load in a speedy and efficient manner, leaving it with less residual water. It is very gentle on your clothes. Stainless steel drum to ensure long life. Completely Safe with Safety Locking Lid and Stabilizing rubber feet. Color: Gray.

302702074.Title: Whirlpool 6.7 cu. ft. 120 Volt White Commercial Electric Vented Dryer Coin Operated
302702074.Description: With 100 years of experience in the industry and features that streamline service, Whirlpool Commercial Laundry machines provide performance with the quality you expect. This heavy-duty 6.7cu. ft. commercial dryer from Whirlpool is built to last. The durable, industrial grade cabinet has the strength to hold up against its toughest users. Is factory coin slide and coin box equipped. Plus, you can rest easy knowing that your dryer comes standard with a 2-year limited parts only warranty. Color: White.

306194262.Title: Panda 2.6 cu.ft. 120-Volt White Compact Portable Electric Laundry Dryer, Sensor Dryer
306194262.Description: The new model of Panda compact portable dryer with the streamlined designed body and touch-Screen Control Panel. Obtain Sensor Dry functions (Auto, Eco, Heavy Dry, Delicate and normal) by the intelligent humidity sensor and Manual dry functions (Hot, Warm and Air Dry).This compact dryer with 2.6 cu. ft. capacity makes it easy to quickly dry clothes, sheets, table linens, and more, without taking up a lot of room - Perfect for apartments or other small living spaces. It perfectly coordinates with any Panda washers, and any other compact washing machines. 120 Voltage can be plugged anywhere. Color: White.

313560609.Title: Samsung 7.4 cu. ft. 240-Volt Champagne Electric Dryer with Sensor Dry, Beige
313560609.Description: Samsung's newest Champagne Dryer has advanced features like Sensor Dry, which sets an ideal cycle time and temperature to help dry clothes evenly and prevent over drying. Additionally, with 10- available cycles, you'll have drying options for almost every garment type and with a reversible dryer door. You can ensure your dryer will fit in almost any laundry space.

204984491.Title: Magic Chef 2.6 cu. ft. White Compact Electric Dryer
204984491.Description: No problem This Magic Chef compact 2.6 cu. ft. electric dryer is perfect for limited spaces. It features a space-saving design that can be wall mounted or placed on a countertop. This machine is suitable for apartments, dorms and RVs. It's equipped with two temperature settings, ensuring options for proper fabric care. Designed with ECO Mode and Sensor Dry Selector for energy efficiency, this compact dryer uses a standard 110-Volt outlet so there is no need for special wiring. Color: White.

302468802.Title: Danby 3.42 cu. ft. White Electric Dryer
302468802.Description: Simplify laundry with this Danby 3.42 cu. ft. electric dryer. The sleek, portable machine boasts a smart electronic control system with four different drying programs and three temperature settings. It has what you need to ensure proper fabric care. Made for easy installation, you can set up this compact dryer by simply venting the unit through a sliding door or window and plugging it in. The stainless steel tub accommodates up to 13.2 lbs. of clothing and the steel cabinet is made from rust-resistant galvanized steel for lasting use. For added convenience, this dryer includes castors for easy transport. It can also be wall-mounted to free up floor space. Color: White.

316091630.Title: LG Electronics 7.3 cu. ft. White Electric Top Load Dryer with Sensor Dry
316091630.Description: No one said laundry day was easy-but LG dryer innovations might just change your mind. LG Sensor Dry system measures the amount of moisture levels throughout the cycle and automatically adjusts the drying time. With the FlowSense Duct Clogging and Clean Filter Indicators, you'll know when it's time to clean the ducts and the lint filter out to ensure great drying every time. All the more reason to take advantage of the 7.3 cu. ft. extra-large capacity that handles really large loads. You'll save time and energy. Color: White.

304753183.Title: Whirlpool 7.0 cu. ft. 240-Volt White Electric Vented Dryer with AUTODRY Drying System
304753183.Description: Care for the whole family's fabrics with this large capacity top load dryer. Choose between the AUTODRY system, which helps prevent overdrying, or Timed Dry, which lets you manually control your drying schedule. Help keep wrinkles from setting in with the WRINKLE SHIELD option and easily transfer loads from the washer to this automatic dryer with a wide-opening hamper door. Color: White.

314103818.Title: Samsung 7.2 cu. ft. 240-Volt White Electric Dryer with Sensor Dry
314103818.Description: Samsung's new dryers have advanced features like Sensor Dry, which optimizes cycle time and temperature to thoroughly dry without damaging your clothes. Also, with 7.2 cu. ft. capacity and 8 Preset Drying Cycles, you can do fewer loads in less time and fulfill almost every drying need. With a reversible dryer door, you can choose the direction your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout. Color: White.

312470883.Title: Whirlpool 8.8 cu. ft. 240-Volt Smart White Electric Dryer with Steam and Advanced Moisture Sensing Technology, ENERGY STAR
312470883.Description: Help prevent overdrying with moisture sensors in this top load electric dryer. You can create customized cycles for your large capacity dryer in a few touches, and control the dryer remotely to manage laundry day from your smartphone. Plus, steam cycles and options help keep wrinkles from setting and reduce static in the smart capable electric dryer. Color: White.

306654292.Title: LG Electronics Styler Steam Closet Smart Clothing Care System with Asthma & Allergy Friendly Sanitizer in Espresso Dark Brown
306654292.Description: The LG Styler Steam Closet sanitizes, deodorizes, freshens and dries an endless number of clothing and household items. Just toss them in and the powerful, chemical-free steam technology and moving hanger system takes care of the rest. Caring for hard-to-wash items, the fussiest fabrics and everything in between has never been so effortless. Let this steam closet shake things off - get peace of mind and convenient cleaning assistance in one sleek, go-anywhere design. Color: Espresso.

206855036.Title: Whirlpool 5.9 cu. ft. 240-Volt White Electric Vented Dryer with AccuDry
206855036.Description: Keep laundry day running smooth using this large capacity Whirlpool dryer with a flat back design that fits into tight spaces like closets or small utility rooms. This top load dryer has enough room to easily handle large loads while also helping to reduce damage caused by overdrying with the AccuDry sensor drying system. Clothes stay looking good even after the cycle stops with the Wrinkle Shield option, which intermittently tumbles for up to 90 minutes after the cycle ends to help keep wrinkles from setting into your clothes. This 5.9 cu. ft. large capacity dryer also provides a leg up on fabric care with the Jeans cycle that gives all your favorite denim the extra care it needs. Color: White.

302700635.Title: Whirlpool 6.7 cu. ft. 120 Volt White Commercial Electric Vented Dryer
302700635.Description: With 100 years of experience in the industry and features that streamline service, Whirlpool Commercial Laundry machines provide performance with the quality you expect. This heavy-duty 6.7cu. ft. commercial dryer from Whirlpool is built to last. The durable, industrial grade cabinet has the strength to hold up against its toughest users. Plus, you can rest easy knowing that your dryer comes standard with a 2-year limited parts only warranty. Color: White.

312406270.Title: Maytag 8.8 cu. ft. 240-Volt Smart Capable Metallic Slate Electric Vented Dryer with Steam, ENERGY STAR
312406270.Description: One push of the Extra Power button on Maytag heavy duty dryers boosts drying power on any cycle by extending time, heat and tumbling. Commercial-grade dryer technology ensures it's built to last. Optional smart electric dryer features like remote start and cycle notifications help you stay in control and efficiently manage laundry from anywhere. Color: Metallic Slate.
